abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Ecuatoriana Restaurant, which preserves flavor of Ecuadorean community in Sugar Hill area of Hamilton Heights in Manhattan.
lead_paragraph: While much of the Ecuadorean community in the Sugar Hill area of Hamilton Heights has moved out, its impact on the neighborhood remains alive at Ecuatoriana Restaurant.

headline.main: Ecuatoriana Restaurant Is a Link to Ecuador in Harlem

snippet: While much of the Ecuadorean community in the Sugar Hill area of Hamilton Heights has moved out, its impact on the neighborhood remains alive at Ecuatoriana Restaurant.
